channel.title: Errors please help me!

item.title: Errors please help me!
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

if((itemUsed == 1436) && (useWith == 1444)) { // use ess with air tally if(playerLevel[20] >= 15) { sendMessage("You make an water rune"); deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(555, 1); // water rune addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); } } if((itemUsed == 1436) && (useWith == 1440)) { // use ess with earth tally if(playerLevel[20] >= 20) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(557, 1); // earth rune sendMessage("You make an earth rune"); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); } } if((itemUsed == 1436) && (useWith == 1442)) { // use ess with fire tally if(playerLevel[20] >= 30) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(554, 1); // fire rune sendMessage("You make an fire rune"); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); } } if((itemUsed == 1436) && (useWith == 1452)) { // use ess with chaos tally if(playerLevel[20] >= 35) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(562, 1); // water rune sendMessage("You make an chaos rune"); addSkillXP((750*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); } } if((itemUsed == 1436) && (useWith == 1462)) { // use ess with nature tally if(playerLevel[20] >= 50) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(561, 1); // water rune sendMessage("You make an nature rune"); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); } } if((itemUsed == 1436) && (useWith == 1458)) { // use ess with air tally if(playerLevel[20] >= 80) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(563, 1); // law rune sendMessage("You make an law rune"); addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); } }

By the way your code is messy.

Read full topic

item.title: Errors please help me!
item.dc:creator: @comboown comboown
item.description:
@comboown wrote:

if((itemUsed == 1436 && useWith == 1444)) { // use ess with air tally sendMessage("You make an water rune"); if(playerLevel[20] >= 15) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(555, 1); // water rune addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); } if((itemUsed == 1436 && useWith == 1440)) { // use ess with earth tally sendMessage("You make an earth rune"); if(playerLevel[20] >= 20) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(557, 1); // earth rune addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); } if((itemUsed == 1436 && useWith == 1442)) { // use ess with fire tally sendMessage("You make an fire rune"); if(playerLevel[20] >= 30) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(554, 1); // fire rune addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); } if((itemUsed == 1436 && useWith == 1452)) { // use ess with chaos tally sendMessage("You make an chaos rune"); if(playerLevel[20] >= 35) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(562, 1); // water rune addSkillXP((750*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); } if((itemUsed == 1436 && useWith == 1462)) { // use ess with nature tally sendMessage("You make an nature rune"); if(playerLevel[20] >= 50) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(561, 1); // water rune addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); } if((itemUsed == 1436 && useWith == 1458)) { // use ess with air tally sendMessage("You make an law rune"); if(playerLevel[20] >= 80) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(725); addItem(563, 1); // law rune addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[20]), 20); stillgfx(150, absY, absX); }

what is wrong on this ?
